home.introduction.catchphrase.message: Let everyone know what you are doing!
home.introduction.catchphrase.description: First phrase that a user reads on our website

home.introduction.button.discord.description: Discord server button -> redirects to Discord invite; {0} will be replaced with 'Discord' -> is a variable

home.examples.playingagame.description: Discord Rich Presence -> Playing a game

home.examples.timestamp.description: Discord Rich Presence -> time left; {0} will be replaced with the current timestamp -> is a variable

home.cards.subheading.message: We have lots of features, but let's show you our primary features which you can only find in PreMiD.

home.cards.presencesystem.explanation.message: We developed our extension in a way that allows you to add and use presences created by other users and manage them in the extension!

home.cards.mediacontrols.explanation.message: Most of our presences provide support for media controls. You can skip, pause and play tracks/videos while using other applications.

home.cards.multilingual.explanation.message: Nie každý je dobrý v Angličtine. Preto prekladáme naše rozšírenie a stránku do iných jazykov, možno aj do tvojo!

home.cards.opensource.explanation.message: Everything we do is open source. If you find a bug or want to add a new feature you can create an issue or pull request on our GitHub repository!
